mainEntity.name: Q1: Do you provide doorstep scrap pickup in Kandivali, and is there a minimum quantity required for pickup?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Scrapiz offers free doorstep scrap pickup in Kandivali, Mumbai. There is no strict minimum quantity — most normal household scrap (20–30 kg) is picked up for free. For very small quantities, a nominal ₹60 convenience fee may apply.

mainEntity.name: Q2: What scrap items do you buy in Kandivali?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our Scrapiz Kandivali scrap buyers accept all types of materials including iron scrap, steel scrap, aluminum scrap, copper scrap, paper waste, plastic scrap, furniture scrap, and electronic e-waste in Kandivali. We provide the best scrap rates in Kandivali for all items.

mainEntity.name: Q3: How can I book Scrapiz scrap service in Kandivali?

acceptedAnswer.text: Booking our scrap dealer service in Kandivali Mumbai is quick and easy. Simply call us at +91 8828700630 or use WhatsApp for instant booking. Our online scrap pickup in Kandivali saves you time and effort.

mainEntity.name: Q4: Do you offer the best scrap rates in Kandivali?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Scrapiz is known as the top scrap dealer in Kandivali because we provide the most competitive and updated scrap prices in Kandivali Mumbai. Whether you want to sell scrap online in Kandivali West or call us for doorstep pickup, we guarantee the best value.

mainEntity.name: Q5: Do you serve nearby areas from Kandivali?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely! Along with scrap pickup in Kandivali, we also serve Borivali, Malad, Dahisar, and Gorai. Scrapiz is your trusted choice for scrap buyers in Kandivali and nearby suburbs of Mumbai.
